verses.text: \w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w fool|strong="H5036"\w* \f + \fr 14:1 \ft The Hebrew words rendered fool throughout the Psalms denote one who is morally deficient.\f* says \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, “There \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* God.” \w They|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w corrupt|strong="H7843"\w*; \w their|strong="H6213"\w* \w acts|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* vile. There \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H2896"\w* \w who|strong="H2896"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w looks|strong="H7200"\w* \w down|strong="H8259"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w any|strong="H3426"\w* \w understand|strong="H7919"\w*, \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w any|strong="H3426"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w become|strong="H3162"\w* corrupt;\f + \fr 14:3 \ft LXX worthless\f* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*.\f + \fr 14:3 \ft Cited in Romans 3:10–12\f*

\w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* iniquity \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w learn|strong="H3045"\w*? \w They|strong="H3068"\w* devour \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H6662"\w*, overwhelmed \w with|strong="H8033"\w* \w dread|strong="H6343"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* God \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w in|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* company \w of|strong="H6343"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* sinners frustrate \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w plans|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6041"\w*, \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w shelter|strong="H4268"\w*.

\w Oh|strong="H4310"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*! \w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w restores|strong="H7725"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w captive|strong="H7622"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*!
